titleInfo.subTitle: ORDER as to Leonardo Contreras signed by Judge John A. Mendez on 10/29/14: The property posted under the appearance bond shall be exonerated and reconveyed, and Defendant Leonardo Contreras shall be relieved from the conditions of the appearance bond. Mr. Contreras' Mexican passport shall be returned. (Kaminski, H)

titleInfo.title: USA v. Pena et al
titleInfo.subTitle: STIPULATION AND ORDER signed by Judge John A. Mendez on January 5, 2015 as to Jose Melecio Pena re 215. The Sentencing Hearing set for 01/13/2015 is CONTINUED TO 3/3/2015 at 09:30 AM in Courtroom 6 (JAM) before Judge John A. Mendez. Reply or statement of non-opposition due by February 24, 2015;Motion for correction of Pre-Sentence report due by filed February 17, 2015; Pre-Sentence report filed by February 10,2015; Counsels written objections to the pre-sentence to probation due by February 3, 2015. (Rivas, A)
